parameters.name: CheckGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the group to which the check item belongs.

parameters.name: CheckId
parameters.description:
The ID of the check item.

>  You can call the [ListCheckResult](~~ListCheckResult~~) operation to query the IDs of check items.

parameters.name: InstanceIds
parameters.description: The instance IDs of the assets.

parameters.name: Remark
parameters.description: The description. The value of this parameter can be up to 65,535 bytes in length.

parameters.name: RuleType
parameters.description:
The type of the rule. Default value: **WHITE**. Valid value:

*   WHITE: adds check items to the whitelist.
